entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers this morning. A few showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this morning. High 8. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 6:27 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind east 20 km/h. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:27 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle. High 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:27 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
